Title: Relates to licensed pet breeders and brokers
Summary: Relates to licensed pet breeders and brokers; requires a pet dealer to only purchase a dog or cat for resale from a breeder or broker licensed by the United States department of agriculture or exempt from United States department of agriculture licensing per United States department of agriculture regulation, and such breeder or broker shall be in possession of all other licenses required for a breeder or broker by the state in which such breeder or broker is located.
LawCode: Add ยง409, amd ยง408, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to licensed pet breeders and brokers
